text: Enoch zu Guttenberg, (29 July 1946 – 15 June 2018) was a German conductor. He also owned the large winery estate Weingut Reichsrat von Buhl. He was born in Guttenberg, Bavaria, Germany. He was a member of the House of Guttenberg. Guttenberg died on 15 June 2018 at the age of 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Georg Etschelt: Abendzeitung-Muenchen.de Ein Nachruf / Enoch zu Guttenberg (†71): Ein inbrünstiger Überzeugungstäter Abendzeitung Munich, 16 June 2018 * Enoch zu Guttenberg (Conductor) Bach Cantatas Website * Joseph Haydn (1732–1809) / Die Schöpfung (The Creation) musicweb-international.com Category:1946 births Category:2018 deaths Category:German conductors Category:People from Bavaria
title: Enoch zu Guttenberg
